description:
Part-time employees

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45211 Monthly statistics: wholesale and commission trade
45212 Monthly statistics of retail trade
45213 Monthly statistics: accommodation and food services
45214 Monthly statistics of motor vehicle trade
45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services

Definition:
The employment was part-time when the regular weekly working
hours were shorter than the weekly working hours usually
worked in full-time employment at the survey unit or under a
collective agreement. The extent of the reduction is
irrelevant here (e.g. partial retirement, half-day job, work
on two or three days per week, etc.). Marginally employed
people are counted as part-time employees.
The following are not regarded as "part-time employees":
- people working short-time,
- full-time employees and
- apprentices.
